### Test Drive

It is convenient to *run* `R` code and **embed** plots with Markdown:

```{r mpg, message=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(mpg, aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) + geom_point(aes(color = drv)) + geom_smooth()
```
